name: Chameleon Hydra
description: The Chameleon Hydra has five heads with a formidable presence, covered in colorful scales that allow it to blend seamlessly into its surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to regrow heads unless taking fire damage makes it a formidable opponent in prolonged battles.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting prey and dominate the battlefield through superior regeneration and stealth.
relations: Related to other hydras, often encountered in swampy or forested environments.
environment: Typically found in dense forests, swamps, or other places where it can effectively use its camouflage.
strengths: Exceptional stealth capabilities and regenerative abilities make it difficult to defeat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which can prevent its heads from regenerating.
attacks: Can perform multiple bite attacks and grapple with its sticky tongue, pulling enemies closer.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to regrow heads at the end of its turn unless it has taken fire damage.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a high passive perception of 16, making it difficult to sneak up on.
skills: Excels in stealth and perception, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against many conditions due to multiple heads.
Can hide even when visible to opponents while motionless.
Can grapple opponents with its sticky tongue.
Can pull grappled creatures closer with its reel ability.
Regains hit points when regenerating heads.
